entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
